# init()

**Initializer**

Creates an empty fetch zones operation.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Discussion

You must set the [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKFetchRecordZonesOperation/recordZoneIDs] property before you execute the operation.

After creating the operation, assign a value to the [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKFetchRecordZonesOperation/fetchRecordZonesCompletionBlock] property so you can process the results.

## Initializing the Zone Fetch Operation

- **init(recordZoneIDs:)**: Creates an operation for fetching the specified record zones.
